data.message: Thank you very much Facebook team. You 're awesome. I use Facebook for sharing scriptures, photos of family and friends. I have friends whom I never met. See different places in your own home. It's a very useful application to everybody.. More power to all of you..

replies.message: Thank you for your kind words, Joy! We appreciate you being part of our community. -Chantal

Facebook makes no sense. If someone replies to my post on a page, I get the notification which is great. Except for when you guys expect us to scroll though every comment to find mine just to see what someone replied. Did anyone think about that?
Aw, Joy. You're making us blush! Thank you for being part of your community. -Sarah

You're welcome. We owe you one! Before when there's no Facebook, I have to wait a month to get a letter from my family in the Philippines. But now, just one click and you can communicate and call them for free.. Mark and his team were genius.. Long live to all of you....
Facebook Team is awesome, carry on guys.  Thanks to everyone esp Mr. MZ.
